meanings.sent1: My library card expires next week.
meanings.sent3: I better use this coupon before it expires and becomes useless.
meanings.sent4: His patience finally expires after waiting for hours.
meanings.sent5: The warranty expires after one year, so make sure to get it fixed before then.

meanings.sent1: The movie's runtime expires in two hours.
meanings.sent2: The lease on the apartment expires next month.
meanings.sent3: The party will be fun until it expires at midnight.
meanings.sent4: The day expires with a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent5: The deadline for the project expires tomorrow, so we need to finish it today.

meanings.sent1: The flower expires after blooming for a week.
meanings.sent2: The old tree finally expires after a long life.
meanings.sent3: The battery in my remote control seems to expire quickly.
meanings.sent4: The candle slowly expires, flickering its last light.
meanings.sent5: The fire in the fireplace expires, leaving behind glowing embers.
